keywords.value: Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society B (Journal)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: A scientist is working with Royal Philips to create bulbs that give off less blue light and thus help protect against insect-borne diseases.

headline.print_headline: An Effort to Make LEDs Less Attractive to Insects
headline.main: Making LED Light Bulbs Less Attractive to Insects

snippet: A scientist is working with Royal Philips to create bulbs that give off less blue light and thus help protect against insect-borne diseases.
abstract: Travis Longcore study published in journal Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society B finds LED lights that emit minimal blue light attract fewer insects than standard LEDs, discovery that may be useful in reducing insect-born diseases
